output_list.description: mintToken function allows attackers to increase the total supply of the token arbitrarily, aka 'The Token Devalue' issue.
freezeAccount function allows attackers to freeze accounts, aka 'Access Control' issue.
setPrices function allows attackers to set buy and sell price arbitrarily, aka 'Access Control' issue.
buy function allows attackers to manipulate the buy price, aka 'Bad Randomness' issue.
sell function allows attackers to manipulate the sell price, aka 'Bad Randomness' issue.
